item.title: Book Review: Work Clean
item.description: Down into some net rabbit hole, I stumbled upon a review of Work Clean. I chuckled: a productivity book, philosophizing about how cookâ€™s approach to preparation (mise en place) would fix all our problems? Bring it on, I have a long commute.
